name: The Magic Lance
description:
After discovering the incredible power of The Magic Lance, Steven, the weakest of all monsters, decides to take his bloody revenge on those who wronged him.  Teleport through enemies to destroy them in this visceral action platformer!

Controls:

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

Space: Jump

Left Click: Throw Lance

Right Click: Teleport to Lance

Hold Shift: Recall Lance

Backspace: Main Menu

Escape: Exit Game
